General.Name: Higher Way Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Higher Way Electronic Co., Ltd. provides services for consumer oriented, multimedia, micro-controller IC application design, and solution integration and sales in Taiwan. The company offers speech/music IC application products for ELA, e-book, electronic organs, story machines, interactive toys, voice recognition, reading machines, sports equipment, and other consumer electronics; memory device IC application products used in OID, TV games, play stations, electronic organs, automobile data recorders, multimedia players, and voice recognition products; and LCD controller IC application products used in learning devices, home appliances, electronic organs, timers, electronic dart games, electronic medical devices, and sports header products. It also provides single-chip microcontrollers IC application products for sports equipment headers, medical devices, remote controllers, small home appliances, chargers, tire pressure gauges, heart rate meters, image door bells, and IoT markets; and multi-media controllers IC application products used in play station, learning machine, miniature camera, Bluetooth sound box, Bluetooth earphone, WiFi door bell, automobile panel player, vehicle-mounted MP3, automobile data recorder, sports DV, and other application products. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
